definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Only one sperm fertilizes an egg.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个精子使卵子受精。

sentences.english: Porcine oocytes were separated by method of collagenase and the antigen of zona pellucida was prepared by heating.
sentences.chinese: 胶原酶法分离猪卵巢卵子，热溶解制备透明带抗原。

sentences.english: The nuclear phase of the mature egg is of metaphase of the first mature division.
sentences.chinese: 卵子的成熟核相为第一次成熟分裂中期。

sentences.english: The money, the ISSCR suggested, should not be enough to provide “undue inducement” for women to sell their eggs.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱不应用于“过度劝诱”女性去卖自己的卵子。

sentences.english: The presence of high levels of FSH indicates lower numbers of eggs。
sentences.chinese: 高数值卵泡刺激素则意味着更少的卵子。

sentences.english: After the egg fertilized, it Underwent cortical reaction and formed fertilization membrane.
sentences.chinese: 卵子受精后，发生皮层反应形成受精膜。

sentences.english: They have a special pouch where they carry the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 牠们有特别的育儿袋，袋内装有卵子。

sentences.english: The micropyle of the matured oocyte in the phase 5 was blocked up by the micropyle cells.
sentences.chinese: 在第5时相成熟卵子的受精孔中仍有精孔细胞堵塞。

sentences.english: The largest cell in the human body is the female ovum, or egg cell.
sentences.chinese: 人体中最大的细胞是女性卵子，或卵细胞。

sentences.english: It spurns delay and pointless diplomacy. An army of sperm must assault an ova and overcome it.
sentences.chinese: 精子大军必须侵入一个卵子并且占有它。

sentences.english: The oogenesis of Gambusia affinis is divided into 6 phases.
sentences.chinese: 食蚊鱼卵子发育过程分为6个时相。

sentences.english: And that's where the egg – there's usually only one in the woman's pond at a time – gets fertilised.
sentences.chinese: 每一次女人的池塘里通常只有一个卵子可以受精”。

sentences.english: Women are born with all of the eggs they will ever carry.
sentences.chinese: 女性生来就具有她们所要携带的所有卵子细胞。

sentences.english: The fish, smallmouth and largemouth bass, were male but nevertheless carried immature eggs.
sentences.chinese: 这种小口黑鲈和黑鲈为雄性，却带有未成熟的卵子。

sentences.english: The cytoplasm and eggs single sperm injection is more complicated some.
sentences.chinese: 而卵子胞浆内单精子注射则比较复杂一些。

sentences.english: Sperm race towards the unfertilized egg.
sentences.chinese: 精虫朝未受精的卵子冲去。
